thread.title: BRIEF-GKN quarterly sales drop 0.5 pct to 2.6 bln stg-Melrose

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-GKN quarterly sales drop 0.5 pct to 2.6 bln stg-Melrose
text:
Melrose Industries PLC:
* GKN QUARTERLY SALES 2.599 BILLION STG VERSUS 2.611 BILLION STG YEAR AGO
* * GKN GROUP SALES IN PERIOD WERE £2,599 MILLION (2017: £2,611 MILLION)
* GROUP OPERATING PROFIT WAS £181.5 MILLION (2017: £215.1 MILLION)
* GROUP OPERATING PROFIT MARGIN WAS 7.0% (2017: 8.2%) * GKN PLC PERFORMANCE IN PERIOD BEFORE MELROSE OWNERSHIP SHOWED TRENDS BELOW CURRENT MARKET EXPECTATIONS FOR GKN FOR PROFIT AND CASH GENERATION
* WHILE THIS GIVES MELROSE A LOWER STARTING POINT FOR GKN THAN CURRENT MARKET CONSENSUS OPINION, MELROSE ALLOWED FOR FURTHER UNDERPERFORMANCE BY GKN PRIOR TO ITS OWNERSHIP
* REMAINS CONFIDENT IT WILL BE ABLE TO DELIVER ON ALL STATEMENTS IT MADE DURING OFFER PERIOD OVER MEDIUM TERM Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
